channel.title: cmwen.github.io Podcast
channel.description: Automatically generated podcasts from blog posts covering software development, AI, and tech productivity.
channel.itunes:author: Min Wen
channel.itunes:summary: Automatically generated podcasts from blog posts covering software development, AI, and tech productivity.

item.title: I'm an ISTJ-A: The Reliable Rock (But Maybe a Little Set in My Ways)
item.description: Ever get called the dependable one? There's a chance you might be an ISTJ-A, just like me! Let's explore what this Myers-Briggs type means and what it's like to live in this organized, logical mind.
item.itunes:author: Min Wen
item.itunes:summary: Ever get called the dependable one? There's a chance you might be an ISTJ-A, just like me! Let's explore what this Myers-Briggs type means and what it's like to live in this organized, logical mind.

item.title: Choosing the Right AI Coding Agent: Remote, CLI, or IDE Mode?
item.description: A practical comparison of GitHub Copilot's remote coding agents, CLI mode, and VS Code agent mode based on real-world experience with Android development and automation tasks.
item.itunes:author: Min Wen
item.itunes:summary: A practical comparison of GitHub Copilot's remote coding agents, CLI mode, and VS Code agent mode based on real-world experience with Android development and automation tasks.

item.title: OpenCode: Code From Anywhere with Your Personal AI Development Server
item.description: How OpenCode's server mode changed my workflow - start long-running tasks on your desktop and check progress from your phone, tablet, or anywhere on your network.
item.itunes:author: Min Wen
item.itunes:summary: How OpenCode's server mode changed my workflow - start long-running tasks on your desktop and check progress from your phone, tablet, or anywhere on your network.
